text:
A welcome surprise.
We had been developing certain "content" fields for styling to extend flexibility for reusing modules.
Unfortunately this "hack" is causing some confusion for the translator connector.
Using the new styles section should make things more clean.
<@U7SL518D6> Any idea when this will come out of Beta ?
Thanks

Hey :slightly_smiling_face: Down anyone know what this is in the design manager preview or if it is new?
And it leads to a consent manager: Warning-Icon
*consentmanager is showing a warning Icon in the left lower corner of my website. What does it mean and what can I do?*
Nice show! Here's a link to the rest of our music if anybody likes grungy rock <https://phantomsuns.bandcamp.com/>
